verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who doesn't <S%H1980><s%> walk in the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> nor stand <S%H5975><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of sinners, <S%H2400><s%> nor sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of scoffers; <S%H3887><s%>
but his delight <S%H2656><s%> is in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s law. <S%H8451><s%> On his law <S%H8451><s%> he meditates <S%H1897><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night. <S%H3915><s%>

He will be like a tree <S%H6086><s%> planted <S%H8362><s%> by the streams <S%H6388><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> that brings forth <S%H5414><s%> its fruit <S%H6529><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> also does not wither. <S%H5034><s%> Whatever he does <S%H6213><s%> shall prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are not so, <S%H4671><s%> but are like the chaff which the wind <S%H7307><s%> drives away. <S%H5086><s%>
Therefore the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not stand <S%H6965><s%> in the judgment, <S%H4941><s%> nor sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> but the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>
